name: World Baseball Stars
description:
Go big or go home ?
In World Baseball Stars, you either smash a home run, or strike out and go home!

Win real-time PVP matches!
World Baseball Stars is here to offer the best experience of one of the most beloved sports in the world!

CASUAL YET REALISTIC SPORTS GAME
Easy to understand and control! Great for everyone who just wants to get in and smash a HOME RUN!

BASEBALL PHYSICS
Experience and learn the dynamics of baseball! Great way to play this amazing sport for newbies and experts alike!
It is not always about batting or pitching with power! It is also about precision and perfect timing!

STRATEGY
Make sure you choose the right strategy and pick a team that will win the game!
There are many ways to win a game, and it is all up to you!

COLLECT
Unlock and collect 50+ players, each with their own unique backstory, talents, and skills!
Enjoy collect them like traditional baseball cards!

PLAY WITH OTHERS
Play against your friends and people around the world to become the Baseball Star!
Compete in local and global leagues as you master the sport!

Enjoy Playing World Baseball Stars?
Like World Baseball Stars on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/WorldBaseballStars
